page.title: 08WALTHAM ABBEY TOWN CLERK.
page.content:
On the 27th June,1985, a group from class 4R interviewed the Town Clerk, at{Waltham Abbey Town Hall.
{Mr Berry}has been Town Clerk for eleven years. He finds it a very enjoyable job. A town clerk may serve until retirement.
During the day he works from 8.45 a.m. till 5 p.m. But he often has to return at 7 p.m. for evening meetings, and he also attends functions with the Mayor.
He has to be well informed because he has to keep the council informed and on occasions give them advice.
Mr Berry receives lots of letters - quite a few of them are complaints! (For information about the Town Hall see page 9).
